scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd client && npm run build) && rm -rf server/dist && cp -R client/dist/gradtrak server/dist
scripts.build-dev: (cd client && npm run build-dev) && rm -rf server/dist && cp -R client/dist/gradtrak server/dist
scripts.start-dev: concurrently -n client,server "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start-dev"
